member.name: P:SmoothCaptcha.CaptchaConfiguration.Characters
member.summary: Gets or sets the captcha characters. the default value is "abcdefhjklmnpqrstuvxyz23456789".

member.name: P:SmoothCaptcha.CaptchaConfiguration.FontFamily
member.summary: Gets or sets the captcha font family name. the default value is "Times New Roman".

member.name: P:SmoothCaptcha.CaptchaConfiguration.FontSpacing
member.summary: Gets or sets the spacing of the captcha characters. the default value is "0".

member.name: P:SmoothCaptcha.CaptchaConfiguration.FontColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the color of the captcha code. the default value is "ffffff".

member.name: P:SmoothCaptcha.CaptchaConfiguration.CodeLength
member.summary: Gets or sets the length of the captcha code lengt. the default value is "5".

member.name: P:SmoothCaptcha.CaptchaConfiguration.BackColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the background color of the captcha background. the default is "ff8800". the null as make transparent background.

member.name: P:SmoothCaptcha.CaptchaConfiguration.Width
member.summary: Gets or sets the width of the captcha image. the default value is "200".

member.name: P:SmoothCaptcha.CaptchaConfiguration.Height
member.summary: Gets or sets the height of the captcha image. the default value is "80".
